instructions:
Tõlgi järgmised atribuudinimed ja -väärtused eesti keelde.

                            Oluline:
                            - Arvesta toote iseloomu ja kogu läbitöödeldud konteksti (pealkiri, kirjeldus, SEO päringud, KKK), et tõlge vastaks toote tegelikele omadustele.
                            - Säilita mõõtühikud õigel kujul (cm, mm, L, W, V jne) ja arvväärtused; kasuta korrektselt eestikeelseid käändeid ja idiomaatilist sõnajärge.
                            - Ära lisa uusi tähendusi ega väärtusi; tõlgi ainult antud nimesid ja väärtusi.
                            - Iga translation-objekt PEAB sisaldama ka "attr_name" välja. Kui kind == "name", siis kasuta attr_name = source.

                            Tagasta täpselt skeemiga { translations: [ { kind: 'name'|'value', source: string, translated: string, attr_name?: string } ] }.
input: {"items": [{"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of hob", "source": "Induction"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Type of surface", "source": "Vitroceramic"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Ignition", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Timer", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Cooking sensor"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Cooking sensor", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Meat probe"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Meat probe", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Pan support type", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Pause function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Pause function", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Child lock", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Power booster function"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Power booster function", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Automatic heating-up"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Automatic heating-up", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Residual heat indicator", "source": "Yes"}, {"kind": "name", "source": "Power limitation"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Power limitation", "source": "No"}, {"kind": "value", "attr_name": "Power (W)", "source": "7200"}]}
